languages.text: "There will be a massacre. It is the Lord Captain's will. Those who refuse will be put out through an airlock."
languages.original_text: "Резне быть. Такова воля Лорд-капитана. Те, кто будет перечить — отправятся в шлюз".

traits.locale_text: "There will be a massacre. It is the Lord Captain's will. Those who refuse will be put out through an airlock."

“这场杀戮无可避免，这是领主舰长的命令。违抗者将被丢出气闸。”
languages.original_text: "There will be a massacre. It is the Lord Captain's will. Those who refuse will be put out through an airlock."

traits.locale_text: “这场杀戮无可避免，这是领主舰长的命令。违抗者将被丢出气闸。”

languages.text: «Vamos a cometer una masacre. Es la voluntad del Lord Capitán. Quienes se resistan serán expulsados por una esclusa de aire».
languages.original_text: "There will be a massacre. It is the Lord Captain's will. Those who refuse will be put out through an airlock."

traits.locale_text: «Vamos a cometer una masacre. Es la voluntad del Lord Capitán. Quienes se resistan serán expulsados por una esclusa de aire».

languages.text: « Massacre il y aura. Telle est la volonté de votre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et ceux qui s'y opposeront seront éjectés par le premier sas venu. »
languages.original_text: "There will be a massacre. It is the Lord Captain's will. Those who refuse will be put out through an airlock."

traits.locale_text: « Massacre il y aura. Telle est la volonté de votre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et ceux qui s'y opposeront seront éjectés par le premier sas venu. »

languages.text: "Es wird ein Massaker geschehen. Das ist der Wunsch des Lord Captains. Jeder, der sich weigert, wird durch eine Luftschleuse gejagt."
languages.original_text: "There will be a massacre. It is the Lord Captain's will. Those who refuse will be put out through an airlock."

traits.locale_text: "Es wird ein Massaker geschehen. Das ist der Wunsch des Lord Captains. Jeder, der sich weigert, wird durch eine Luftschleuse gejagt."

languages.text: 「虐殺が巻き起こるだろう。これはロード・キャプテンの意志だ。拒む者はエアロックより放り出される」
languages.original_text: "There will be a massacre. It is the Lord Captain's will. Those who refuse will be put out through an airlock."

traits.locale_text: 「虐殺が巻き起こるだろう。これはロード・キャプテンの意志だ。拒む者はエアロックより放り出される」

languages.text: "Kıyım yapılacak. Lord Kaptan böyle buyuruyor. Karşı çıkanlar, hava kilidinden fırlatılacak."
languages.original_text: "There will be a massacre. It is the Lord Captain's will. Those who refuse will be put out through an airlock."

traits.locale_text: "Kıyım yapılacak. Lord Kaptan böyle buyuruyor. Karşı çıkanlar, hava kilidinden fırlatılacaklar."
